channel.title: Xml on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Xml on Arrans github.io

item.title: koodo-reader/koodo-reader
item.description: A modern ebook manager and reader with sync and backup capacities for Windows, macOS, Linux, Android, iOS and Web

item.title: mikefarah/yq
item.description: yq is a portable command-line YAML, JSON, XML, CSV, TOML and properties processor

item.title: wader/fq
item.description: jq for binary formats - tool, language and decoders for working with binary and text formats

item.title: TomWright/dasel
item.description: Select, put and delete data from JSON, TOML, YAML, XML and CSV files with a single tool. Supports conversion between formats and can be used as a Go package.

item.title: Boeing/config-file-validator
item.description: Cross Platform tool to validate configuration files
